org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.core

Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmap4u.builder.ShapeBuilder<T>
      • org.openmap4u.plugin.builder.core.Line
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Buildable<ShapeStyleable,Line>, Drawable<ShapeStyleable>, Plugable, ShapeDrawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractConnector

    public class Line
extends ShapeBuilder<T>
    Draws a line.
    Author:
    Michel Hadrbolec

      Convenience class to draw a vertical line.
